mapper.select: SELECT pms_monitor_plan.id, pms_monitor_plan.`name`, pms_monitor_plan.description, pms_monitor_plan.punch_count, pms_monitor_plan.punch_quantity, pms_monitor_plan.total_bonus, pms_monitor_plan.start_time, pms_monitor_plan.end_time, pms_monitor_pattern.description AS plan_pattern, pms_monitor_plan_status.description AS plan_status FROM pms_monitor_plan, pms_monitor_pattern, pms_monitor_plan_status WHERE pms_monitor_plan.user_id = #{uid} AND pms_monitor_plan.monitor_pattern_id = pms_monitor_pattern.id AND pms_monitor_plan.plan_status_id = pms_monitor_plan_status.id ORDER BY pms_monitor_plan.id DESC

SELECT pms_monitor_plan.image_url, pms_monitor_plan.name, pms_monitor_plan.description, pms_monitor_plan.punch_count, pms_monitor_plan.punch_cycle, pms_monitor_plan.punch_quantity, pms_monitor_plan.total_bonus, pms_monitor_plan.monitor_bonus, pms_monitor_plan.start_time, pms_monitor_plan.end_time, pms_monitor_pattern.description AS plan_pattern, pms_monitor_plan_status.description AS plan_status FROM pms_monitor_plan, pms_monitor_pattern, pms_monitor_plan_status WHERE pms_monitor_plan.id = #{pid} AND pms_monitor_plan.monitor_pattern_id = pms_monitor_pattern.id AND pms_monitor_plan.plan_status_id = pms_monitor_plan_status.id ORDER BY pms_monitor_plan.id DESC

SELECT pms_monitor_plan.name, pms_monitor_plan.monitor_quantity, pms_monitor_pattern.description AS plan_pattern FROM pms_monitor_plan, pms_monitor_pattern WHERE pms_monitor_plan.id = #{planId} AND pms_monitor_plan.monitor_pattern_id = pms_monitor_pattern.id
